Description: Unique identifier for each loan
Unique identifier for each borrower
The listed amount of the loan applied for by the borrower
The total amount committed by investors at the time of loan funding
The total amount funded by investors
Number of payments on the loan (e.g., 36 months, 60 months)
Interest rate on the loan (annual percentage rate)
The monthly payment owed by the borrower if the loan is funded
Loan grade assigned by Lending Club (A to G), indicating credit quality
More granular loan grade (e.g., A1, A2, ..., G5)
Job title of the borrower (free text)
Employment length in years (e.g., "10+ years", "< 1 year")
Home ownership status: RENT, OWN, MORTGAGE, OTHER
Self-reported annual income of the borrower
Income verification status: Verified, Source Verified, Not Verified
The month the loan was funded (e.g., "Dec-2011")
Current status of the loan (Fully Paid, Charged Off, Default, Current, Late, etc.)
Whether a payment plan has been put in place (y/n)
URL for the loan on Lending Club website
Loan description provided by the borrower (free text)
The stated purpose of the loan (e.g., debt consolidation, credit card, home improvement)
Loan title provided by the borrower (free text)
First 3 digits of the borrower’s ZIP code
State of the borrower’s residence
Debt-to-income ratio (monthly debt payments divided by monthly income)
Number of delinquencies in the past 2 years
The month the borrower’s earliest reported credit line was opened (e.g., "Jan-1985")
Lower bound of borrower’s FICO credit score range
Upper bound of borrower’s FICO credit score range
Number of credit inquiries in the past 6 months
Months since last delinquency (null if none)
Months since last public record (e.g., bankruptcy) (null if none)
Number of open credit lines in the borrower’s credit file
Number of derogatory public records (e.g., bankruptcies)
Total credit revolving balance
Revolving line utilization rate (percentage of credit line used)
Total number of credit lines currently in borrower’s credit file

Remaining outstanding principal on the loan
Remaining outstanding principal funded by investors

Last payment amount received

Number of collections in last 12 months excluding medical collections
Months since most recent 90-day or worse rating (null if none)
